metadata.title: Domain Risk Score - DomainTools Iris Investigate
metadata.description: Given a domain or set of domains associated with an incident return the risk scores and adjust the severity of the incident if a high risk domain is observed, adding the risk details in the comments of the incident.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message:
DomainTools Risk Score details for: @{variables('domain_name')} : @{variables('domain_risk_score')}
Domain Risk Components: @{replace(replace(replace(body('Domain_Risk_Score_Table') , '"', ''),']','') , '[', '') }

Find more details: https://research.domaintools.com/iris/search/?q=@{variables('domain_name')}
